<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_nlu_discovery_report_definition</collection> <condition/> <description>Create Default Topic Recommendations setting for a table and model combo from Discovery Report Definition</description> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Default Topic Recommendations setting</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) { var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_topic_recommend_default_setting'); gr.addQuery('data_source', current.table); gr.addQuery('taxonomy', current.model); gr.query(); if (!gr.next()) { var ngr = new GlideRecord('sn_topic_recommend_default_setting'); ngr.setValue('data_source',current.getValue('table')); ngr.setValue('taxonomy', current.getValue('model')); ngr.setValue('field_to_analyze', current.getValue('field')); ngr.setValue('filter_by', current.getValue('filter')); ngr.insert(); }
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-09-16 13:13:27</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>19fa8c2953931010bf6bddeeff7b1220</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Default Topic Recommendations setting</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="">87c995fd53d21010a813ddeeff7b12e1</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">87c995fd53d21010a813ddeeff7b12e1</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_19fa8c2953931010bf6bddeeff7b1220</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-09-16 16:41:23</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=19fa8c2953931010bf6bddeeff7b1220"/> </record_update>
